StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecrui.ngOrgByID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ID int ) AS
SELECT [ORGANIZATION_ID] ,[STATE_CODE] ,[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] ,[MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID] ,[NAME] ,[SHORT_NAME] ,[MCC_CODE] ,[TO_PROD_RECRUITERS] ,[STREET] ,[STREET2] ,[CITY] ,[ZIP_CODE] ,[ISOPEN] ,[DELETED] ,[IS_ASSIGNED] ,[EFFECTIVE_DATE] ,[poc_email] ,[OrgUnitId] ,[rowguid] FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [ORGANIZATION_ID] = @ID
